price: „О ватро!“ Рекосмо Ми, „буди хладна, и спас Авраму!“
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
